email_body:
Dear Associate,
I wish to use this medium to reach out to you and at 
the same time strongly advice that you endevore to treat this mail as 
discreet and urgent as possible.
My name is Geophrey Alabasten,i am the 
personal account officer to one Engineer.B.Williams a foreign 
expartriate with Mobil Petroleum Company Netherlands,herein shall be 
referred to as my client.My client was one of those involved in the 
Alaska Airlines Flight 261 plane crash that took place on the 4 
february 2000 which claimed the lives of every passangers aboard that 
Airplane.
He had operated an account here with FINANS BANK 
(Netherlands) valued at 8.5m EUROS. Since i got informations about his 
death i have been expecting his next of kin to come over and claim this 
funds in the custody of the bank b'cos the money can only be released 
and paid to the next of kin to the deceased as indicated in the banking 
laws and guidlines.I was however notified to have the next of kin claim 
this money but several enquries i made inorder to get in contact with 
his possible relation revealed that his supposed relations were among 
those in the plane crash leaving nobody for the claim.
The banking laws 
and guidlines here stipulates that if such account remains dormant for 
over 5yrs funds will be decleared as unclaimed and subsequently will be 
diverted into the bank treasury as unclaimed funds.In view to this,the 
bank have indicated action to divert this funds in question into the 
bank treasury within the next ( 21 ) official working days.
My request 
to have a foreigner stand as the next of kin as the case may be is 
occassioned by the fact that my client was a foreigner and an indigene 
cannot stand as next of kin to a foreigner,on this note having 
contacted you is to assist claim this money thereby presenting you to 
the bank as the next of kin to enable the release and payment of this 
funds to you b'cos i dont want this funds to be diverted into the bank 
treasury as unclaimed funds.I will be counting on your reputation as 
being reliable and rightfull for this transaction.Positive measures to 
facilitate the success of this transaction have been arranged and will 
carefully be executed.This transaction is 100% risk free,so on gaining 
your interest in my offer to you then we can further discuss on the 
terms and modalities for disbursing of the money.
Understand that to 
ensure the success of this claim as arranged pls do note that an 
application bearing your paticulars has to be mailed to the bank making 
claims of this funds as next of kin,having said this kindly furnish me 
with this information below to enable me properly address a formal 
application letter that will be used in contacting the bank.
1.Your 
full name and contact & postal address, 2.Your telephone and fax number 
for easy communication.Upon receipt of your reply, I will send to you 
by fax or email the text of the application. I anticipate your prompt 
response to this effect.Kindly reply mail to-->  
geo_20010@hotmail.com
Sincerely,Geophrey Alabasten.
